title: Brazil : most valuable soccer players at the 2018 FIFA World Cup
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Neymar and lowest at Month Ederson.
The Market value in million euros of Month Neymar is 3.6% larger than the minimum value at Ederson.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market value in million euros in each Month on the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Neymar and lowest at Month Ederson.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Neymar and lowest at Month Ederson.
The Market value in million euros of Month Neymar is 3.6% larger than the minimum value at Ederson.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 10 number of Months.
The Market value in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Neymar and lowest at Month Ederson.
The difference of Market value in million euros between the highest and lowest Month is 130.0.
Market value in million euros at Month Neymar is 180.0 , second place is Philippe Coutinho at 100.0, and thirdly is Gabriel Jesus at 80.0.
The Market value in million euros has lowered over the past 10 Months.
Similar Market value in million euros is found in Month Casemiro, Marcelo, and Alisson.
The average Market value in million euros in all 10 Months is 78.0.
